Articles.Content:
I\'m presenting the Grumman F-14B 'Tomcat'

NEEDS:

NovaPunch (New Update)

Damned Aerospace

In the SPH

'CAT' launch (it\'s actually a RATO, but it\'s in place of the Catapult system'

Just an action shot

Special Instructions:

When launching, wait until you hit 30m/s before activating the rockets, then pitch up.

It will either a) turn into a STOL, about half the runway or hit 149m/s at the end and then respond to pitch controls.

ALSO: turn down your roll sensitivity or else you\'re going to snap roll all over the place!!

WARNING: When you\'ve got the drop tanks attached, don\'t let your nose drop below the horizon, or else you have to ditch them early!

Feedback?

(Yes I know the fuselage is wrong, but it looked wrong when I did it MiG style)

DL:http://www./?aaofb6obqgbk57q
